title: Can we bring back pink ward trinket?
body: Why was it removed in the first place? I would really like to have an option to have a pink ward when Im already full build in the lategame.

replies.body:
Because Riot wanted vision to be more team eccentric without over stuffing the map with wards. 

Now these days you barely have 4 stealth wards on the map with two control wards out. l0l

_**back then**_: ur teammates are retards and never use ward thruout the entire game? If u need that vision, u can still get wards for urself and carry urself out of bronze division.

**_now_**: ur teammates are retards and wont ward at all thruout the entire game? Good luck with current ward trinket. You cant buy stealth wards. And the trinket dont even last long enough nor regenerate fast enough to have 1 ward up full time. Suck it up, and rot in the bronze hell. Wait, you are a support main? Cool, recall every 2min 30sec for ward recharging or u wont even get to have 3 stealth wards up in the map.

EDIT: bronze and silver
You don't even need that many wards in bronze. You need like two and superior macro play for an easy baron.
You don't need anything for Bronze other than any semblance of mechanics.

> You don't need anything for Bronze other than any semblance of mechanics.

Or some semblance of macro.

I'm in gold rn, and I can call out ganks ezpz. I main support and I barely need sightstone until we actually start taking tower.

In fact, I'm seriously considering doing away with Yellow trinket and just building Red so I can proactively prevent teleports.

From what I can understand, didn't they also go on to suggest that games were too safe due to all the "no cost vision"? I'd have to find the exact post, but I remember that one of their reasons was something like that.

Also, 2 control wards? You must be playing in gold+, as like 90% of my games have neither team buying any and using their starting trinket all of twice in the first 10mins before they ignore that entirely as well.
You know, it always amuses me when somebody places 2 or 3 wards all game. Like it shows that they know how to ward (as opposed to those who place 0 wards), but they just don't.

yeah... this...

Unpopular opinion: I don't mind having control wards in the game but what I want is the Greater Vision Totem {{item:3362}} (or control ward in this case) to come back. It feels awkward to lose a control/vision ward in the late game and you have used up all 6 item slots in your build. You would have to temporarily risk not having your full build if you want to put another ward on the rift and you may not have enough money to repurchase your sold item at that time.
How is this an "unpopular opinion"? It's literally what the op was saying...

Ok, my bad, this is what happens when I don't reread things carefullly.

EDIT: What I meant to say was I don't care as much if the vision ward would come back but I would want a Greater Control Totem in this case as a trinket.
I don't know about you guys, but whenever the game hits that stage, pinks are almost immediately destroyed anyways.
Usually they're helpful for revealing vision around objectives to try and keep control of an area.
i made a post about this recently it just seems so dumb to not have true sight in trinkets im still not sure why they thought it was a good idea to remove them horrible game balance on their part.
Better yet, when lvl1 scanner detects a ward it should be permanently detected.

I wonder if they could have some trinket that is basically a holding bag for Control Wards, so you can purchase Control Wards at full build; they just are put in your trinket slot.

Just a thought. Might be OP.
It got removed because vision is OP and because having 5 items and 3 pinks is a legit (and admirable, imo) support strat.

Before I start, I would like to state that I am siding neither with you nor with Riot in this situation. I'm simply stating my thoughts.

I'm a little lost here. I'm newer to the game, so sorry if I'm mistaken, but didn't pink wards basically work the same as control wards in that you needed an item slot for them? Or could you put them in the trinket slot if you were full build?

Also, why don't you just have your support and maybe jungled buy a sweeper? If it's because they won't listen to you, then that's another problem entirely. 

Maybe they removed pink wards because you could basically have both wards and a sweeper without having to forfeit anything. Maybe they tried to make the game more team-oriented by making it so that, come late game, you're forced to share vision duties. I'm not saying it justifies what they did as I don't know enough about the game to say whether this change is good or bad.

Besides, it's still an even playing field; the enemy team has to deal with this as well. You're not at a disadvantage or anything.

On a final note, may I ask what specific situation(s) drove you to make this post?

You know how you can replace Sweeping Lens with Oracle Alteration at level 9 and above?
The yellow trinket used to work the same way: You could replace the Warding Totem (stores 2) with a single pink ward trinket (stores 1) at level 9.

I'm not sure why they got rid of it. It was pretty great. :)
What season was this? I only ever remember having the Farsight Alteration.
Just reply to me, click on the item section, and type in "Greater Vision Totem."  You can hover over the image to see the details.
Ooooooooh okay{{sticker:slayer-jinx-wink}}
I imagine it could hold the same CD as normal Ward Trinket or an even lower one since only 1 can be placed anyway.
